description: This file provides a client wrapper for Supabase, handling configuration validation, lazy initialization, and error handling for the Supabase client in a React application.

methods.name: getSupabaseConfigStatus
methods.description: Checks and returns the current configuration status of Supabase, including validation of environment variables and JWT format.

methods.name: logSupabaseConfigErrorOnce
methods.description: Logs configuration errors to the console once to avoid repetitive logs.

methods.name: getSupabaseInitState
methods.description: Public method returning the current configuration status, including whether Supabase is configured and error messages.

methods.name: isSupabaseConfigured
methods.description: Public method returning a boolean indicating if Supabase is properly configured.

methods.name: getSupabase
methods.description: Lazily initializes and returns the singleton Supabase client, throwing an error if configuration is invalid.
